Shipping

All our products are shipped from our Irish warehouse and will be dispatched within one working day after order confirmation. We use DPD as our courier. Your tracking number will be sent by email as soon as your order has been dispatched. All orders to Ireland are shipped free of charge.

Returns

At LumiRed, we do not doubt that you’ll love your red light therapy device. However, we also understand that you might not like what you get at the end of the day. This is why we have provided a 30-day money-back guarantee.
